Texts.Eng:
It's a bird! No, it's a space ship! No, it's a LITERAL FLYING HORSE!

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;40^reset;% E. Regen. +^green;10^reset;% Speed, +^green;5^reset;% Jump. Fall Damage x^green;0.7^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Grassy/Wooded: Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;7^reset;% Speed & Jump and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist.
  Cold/Hot: Health x^red;0.9^reset;, -^red;10^reset;% speed & jump and -^red;30^reset;% E. Regen.
  Alien/Fleshy: Energy x^red;0.5^reset; and -^red;15^reset;% Speed

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spears: Damage x^green;1.09^reset;
  Double Grenade Launchers: +^green;7.5^reset;% Speed, +^green;25^reset;% Crit Damage
  Bows: +^green;4^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;10^reset;% E. Regen.
  Assault Rifles: +^green;7^reset;% Speed

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.85^reset;. +^red;20^reset;% Hunger Drain
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;10^reset;% Fire, Ice, Electric, -^red;33^reset;% Shadow, ^yellow;-50^reset;% Knockback
